Default package management tool(s): Pacman (will be replaced by Akabei in future)

Approximate number of source packages: {{nts|21041}}{{Efn|From the Sources.gz files in the main  contrib and non-free sections of Debian Jessie. On the 2015-11-21  Debian Sid  the development release  have 24757 source packages.}}
{{nts|19092}}[180]{{Efn|Note this number is just of packages in the Official Gentoo Overlay (or Portage Tree). Several hundred other packages are available from other overlays}}
Graphical installation process: {{yes}}{{Efn|Can be installed graphically (GTK+ and ncurses)  but traditionally done by command line (install cd  live cd  netboot  and from distributions).}}

Default package management tool(s): XBMCbuntu addon manager  own and 3rd party addons

Approximate number of source packages: Tumleweed) counting the entris in the package database file http://download.opensuse.org/tumbleweed/repo/oss/repodata/662416e0920e2bc2bb5ca45e337dcab310325f28ab1e5661d6f876b8dc232103-susedata.xml.gz{{Dead link|date=April 2019 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}. Count no architecture and 64bit architecture only to avoid duplicate count via grep 'package pkgid="' '/tmp/662416e0920e2bc2bb5ca45e337dcab310325f28ab1e5661d6f876b8dc232103-susedata.xml' | grep noarch | wc (which gives 16000 and grep 'package pkgid="' '/tmp/662416e0920e2bc2bb5ca45e337dcab310325f28ab1e5661d6f876b8dc232103-susedata.xml' | grep x86_64 | wc (which gives 19000). the script http://inai.de/files/dist/countpkg-suse3 -r 'openSUSE_(Factory|Tumbleweed)'  which inspects the project list from the openSUSE.org Build Service instance and discounts non-SUSE and home projects. Numbers for 13.2: 63438 bin  32707 src; for 42.1: 43401 bin  17428 src. This script seems to count all architectures  so the 63'000 suse number could then be compared to a 630'000 debian number - but debian does not support 10 times more software - so better only count the most popular architecture as for the other entries here.
